docs.title: Welcome
docs.text: ecrctl is command line utility for Amazon ECR.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text: Check out install page for installation instructions.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: Check out Usage page for Usage instructions.

docs.title: Contributing
docs.text: Check out Contributing page for Contributing instructions.

docs.title: Contributing
docs.text:
If you want to contribute to this project in following ways:

  • Try it out and raise an Github issue here if,
  • you find any bug/issue

  • you have any feature request

  • Feel free to raise Pull request to fix the issue/bug or for new feature.

Thank you :)

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
• Login to ECR
ecrctl login
  • Login to ECR in different region
ecrctl login --region <region>

Note: You can also set region in environment variable AWS_REGION

  • list repositories
ecrctl get repositories
  • list repositories along with their tags
ecrctl get repositories --show-tags
  • filter repositories based on tag
ecrctl get repositories --tag key=value

you can also use short flag -t

ecrctl get repositories -t key=value
  • List images from a given repository
ecrctl get images --repo <repo-name>
